sn17.8:1.3: Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiya paccusasamayam jarasingalassa vassamanassa”ti?
sn17.8:1.5: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasingalo ukkandakena nama rogajatena phuttho neva bilagato ramati, na rukkhamulagato ramati, na ajjhokasagato ramati;
sn17.8:1.6: yena yena gacchati, yattha yattha titthati, yattha yattha nisidati, yattha yattha nipajjati; tattha tattha anayabyasanam apajjati.
sn17.8:1.7: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu labhasakkarasilokena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto neva sunnagaragato ramati, na rukkhamulagato ramati, na ajjhokasagato ramati;
sn17.8:1.8: yena yena gacchati, yattha yattha titthati, yattha yattha nisidati, yattha yattha nipajjati; tattha tattha anayabyasanam apajjati.
